Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Toronto in 2011...
Traded from Toronto to Chicago (N) on 2/12/2011 (Going to CHN: P M. Pineda. Going to TOR: 1B A. Dickerson, P R. Detwiler, CF D. Stickell)...
Earned first career win on 7/29/2011...
Had first career hit on 4/16/2012, off Brad Halsey (PIT)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/2013, going 4-0, 1.42...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2014, going 4-0, 1.60...
Hit first career homerun on 9/26/2014, off Josh Outman (NYN)...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/25/2018 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 7-8 weeks...
Injured on 5/25/2019 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Chicago (A) on 2/5/2021 (Going to CHN: DH W. Abril. Going to CHA: P M. Pineda)...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Oakland on 7/3/2022 (Going to CHA: P D. Storen, RF G. Springer, C W. Warren Jr., P J. Quintana, P C. Martin. Going to OAK: P M. Pineda, C T. Blume, CF B. Goodwin, P
H. Street)...
